review:
this is my all time favourite movie because this movie has a some up of everything we want from a particular movie like action, thriller,  suspense, a love story and everything we want.
i've seen this movie several times and i really remembered of those characters who put their best efforts to make this iconic movie.
this is the evergreen family movie. i always watch this movie whenever it comes on tv. i love every character of this movie, specially the cute loving chemistry between abhay and mangla
i  love very much  this movie. this movie  is about family love .abhay try his best to join  and keep happy family. this movie touch my heart.
i fall in love with this movie. such a familiar drama it is. fardeen khan was looking very handsome.
this movie is family movie and romance love.comedy.action. triple four commbination good story my fav. movie...üòòüòòüòò
i watch this movie one day in two times very nice music and cast so amaze love
it is very good movie, basically it is a loving family movie. full of emotion, drama and little bit action.
thank you all for liking the movie.  it was wonderful to be part of this movie.
very nice family movie. good chemistry between abhay and mangala
i love this family drama. its very touching.
just love the movie.. really good one..
one among the loveliest movies especially the chemistry between abhay and mangala!!
i liked this movie and songs very much, must much watch movie with family.
nice movie good story good music family type movie
my favourite movie what a love story
good movie god bless you fardeen khan
this is the movie i can watch again. lovish family movie
the standard toched by this movie cannot be matched all time favourite...
fardeen deserve s 10/10 for this movie
